channel.title: Open Source Thursdays on hexdevs
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source Thursdays on hexdevs

item.title: How does the Faker Ruby Gem Work?
item.description: How does the Faker Ruby gem work? How do you contribute to an Open Source Ruby project? Know exactly how by watching us do it live!

item.title: [Guide] How to Contribute to Ruby on Rails
item.description: Are you looking for an opportunity to get more experience as a Ruby on Rails developer? Make meaningful connections with the community? Learn the best practices on how to maintain a large codebase such as Ruby on Rails? What if you had a step by step guide on how to get started? Get your free guide and start contributing to Rails today.

item.title: Just Enough Hotwire with Chris Oliver
item.description: An introduction to Hotwire with Chris Oliver, from GoRails. Hotwire is the new way of making AJAX requests on Ruby on Rails. Learn how to build JavaScript-less Rails with turbo streams, Stimulus, and form_with.

item.title: A Tender Introduction to Ruby Internals with TenderJIT
item.description: A class on Ruby Internals and TenderJIT. Aaron Patterson (tenderlove) joined us on an Open Source Thursdays Expert Guest session to teach you about compilers, interpreters, and how to contribute to TenderJIT.

item.title: TenderJIT: A JIT compiler for Ruby with Aaron Patterson (tenderlove)
item.description: Let's work on a JIT compiler for Ruby that’s written in Ruby! We’re going to start building a JIT for Ruby from the ground up. First, we’ll learn how Ruby’s virtual machine works, then talk about the CPU itself. Finally we’ll start building a JIT for Ruby in Ruby. This session happened on September 30th, 2021.

item.title: How to Contribute to Ruby on Rails
item.description: This post is a summary of the Open Source Thursdays - Expert Session with Rafael França. Learn how to get started, how to fix a bug, navigate the Ruby on Rails codebase and contribute to Open Source projects as a beginner.

item.title: Open Source Thursdays Expert Session with Rafael França on Aug 5th
item.description: Contribute to Ruby on Rails with Rafael França, Rails Core team member, on August 5th

item.title: Open Source Thursdays
item.description: Contributing to Ruby Open Source projects with hexdevs and Ruby Experts.

item.title: Just Enough Hotwire for Rails Developers with Chris Oliver
item.description: Learn Just enough Hotwire for Rails Developers with Chris Oliver (GoRails)
